channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-9121] LEAK: ByteBuf.release() was not called before it's garbage-collected
item.description:
After migrating to an asynchronous JAX-WS client based on Netty (cxf-rt-transports-http-netty-client), we noticed problems with leaking buffers on our canary environment, which turned out to be reproducible locally when running with 
-Dio.netty.leakDetection.level=paranoid.

2025-03-25T12:20:12.740+01:00 ERROR 61788 --- [ntLoopGroup-4-5] io.netty.util.ResourceLeakDetector       : LEAK: ByteBuf.release() was not called before it's garbage-collected. See https://netty.io/wiki/reference-counted-objects.html for more information.
Recent access records:
#1:
    io.netty.buffer.AdvancedLeakAwareCompositeByteBuf.readBytes(AdvancedLeakAwareCompositeByteBuf.java:482)
    io.netty.buffer.AdvancedLeakAwareCompositeByteBuf.readBytes(AdvancedLeakAwareCompositeByteBuf.java:36)
    io.netty.buffer.ByteBufInputStream.read(ByteBufInputStream.java:183)

item.summary: LEAK: ByteBuf.release() was not called before it's garbage-collected

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
